author: jmason
msg: reworked the failover-fix code a little to avoid coredump reported by Malte

author: felicity
msg: Fix for bug 1400.  If a rule was defined with no score, only a single
scoreset would get a score set for it.  We now set a score for all
scoresets unless one is currently defined.  Changed the autolearn code
back to not checking for existence.

author: felicity
msg: For some stupid reason, scoresets may have different rules from each
other, so we need to check for existence. :(

author: felicity
msg: give debug info if we can't use a bayes db due to insufficient messages

author: felicity
msg: always_add_report should be 0, not 1 by default
